20101204013313.000|20101204013315.000|CCO|SUZANNE PRATT REPORTS.
20101204013315.000|20101204013317.000|CCO|>> Reporter: THIS WAS SUPPOSED
20101204013317.000|20101204013319.000|CCO|TO BE THE REPORT THAT SHOWED THE
20101204013319.000|20101204013321.000|CCO|ECONOMY WAS GAINING TRACTION.
20101204013321.000|20101204013322.667|CCO|IT WASN'T, DESPITE BUSIER
20101204013322.667|20101204013324.333|CCO|FACTORIES, RISING AUTO SALES AND
20101204013324.333|20101204013326.000|CCO|CHEERIER CONSUMERS.
20101204013326.000|20101204013327.667|CCO|WE HAVE YET TO SEE ANY
20101204013327.667|20101204013329.333|CCO|MEANINGFUL INCREASE IN HIRING.

20101204013332.667|20101204013334.333|CCO|FIRMS, FACTORIES AND RETAILERS
20101204013334.333|20101204013336.000|CCO|ALL CUTTING JOBS.

20101204013337.667|20101204013339.333|CCO|JOB MARKET IS SLUGGISH AT BEST.
20101204013339.333|20101204013341.000|CCO|>> TO BE FAIR, YOU NEED

20101204013837.714|20101204013839.143|CCO|YOU CAN PROVIDE FROM AN
20101204013839.143|20101204013840.571|CCO|ONLINE PROVIDER AND NOT
20101204013840.571|20101204013842.000|CCO|PAY SALES TAX, BUT IF YOU
